briefTitle: Post-marketing Surveillance for the Clinical Safety and Effectiveness of Eribulin Mesylate in Patients With Inoperable or Recurrent Breast Cancer (Study HAL01S)
officialTitle: Post-marketing Surveillance for the Clinical Safety and Effectiveness of Eribulin Mesylate in Patients With Inoperable or Recurrent Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion criteria :

* Inoperable breast cancer
* Recurrent breast cancer

Exclusion criteria :

* Corresponding to contraindication of eribulin mesylate
* Not applicable to indications of eribulin mesylate
* Not applicable to aggravation or recurrence of breast cancer in patients who have previously been treated with anthracycline and/or taxane antitumor drugs
